elements.title: News(Top News : The Bank of Korea hikes the benchmark rate by 50 basis points, taking a so-called "big step" for the first time as it seeks to contain inflation.) - 2022.07.13 PM5
News(Top News : Daily new COVID-19 caes in South Korea double from a week ago to rise above 30-thousand, hitting the largest daily total in 62 days.) - 2022.07.12 PM5
News(Top News : President Yoon Suk Yeol appoints the country's new top financial regulator without a parliamentary hearing, citing many economic issues to be swiftly addressed.) - 2022.07.11 PM5

News(Top News : The People Power Party's ethic committee suspends the party membership of its chief for six months over allegations that he tried to destroy evidence related to sexual bribery.) - 2022.07.08 PM5
News(Top News : The Yoon Suk Yeol administration announces a plan to reduce the fiscal deficit to within three percent of the gross domestic product to improve fiscal soundness.) - 2022.07.07 PM5
News(Top News : Health authorities report almost 20-thousand new COVID-19 cases, the largest number in 42 days.) - 2022.07.06 PM5
News(Top News : South Korea's inflation hits a newarly 24-year high in June at six percent.) - 2022.07.05 PM5

News(Top News : Kim Jin-pyo, a five-term lawmaker of the main opposition Democratic Party is chosen as the new National Assembly speaker as the rival parties agree to normalize the parliament.  President Yoon Suk Yeol stresses solidarity of shared values as a solution to) - 2022.07.04 PM5
